Week 1.topic: Advanced JavaScript Concepts (ES202X+): Promises, Async/Await, Closures, `this` context, Prototypes, Module System (ESM)
Deep Dive into a Modern Frontend Framework (e.g., React): Components, Props, State, JSX, Component Lifecycle, Virtual DOM
React Hooks Mastery: useState, useEffect, useContext, useRef, useMemo, useCallback, Custom Hooks
Advanced CSS Strategies: CSS-in-JS (Styled Components/Emotion) or Utility-First (Tailwind CSS), CSS Modules, Advanced Responsive Design (Flexbox/Grid mastery), CSS Performance Optimization

Week 2.topic: React Ecosystem & Tooling: React Router (advanced routing, nested routes, protected routes), Error Boundaries
Global State Management: Context API deep dive, Introduction to Redux Toolkit (or Zustand/Jotai for alternatives)
Efficient Data Fetching & Caching: React Query (TanStack Query) or SWR
Frontend Testing Best Practices: Unit testing with Jest/React Testing Library, Introduction to End-to-End testing (Cypress/Playwright)
Build Tools & Optimizations: Webpack/Vite Configuration (advanced features), Code Splitting, Lazy Loading, Image Optimization

Week 3.topic: Node.js & Express.js API Development: RESTful API design, Advanced Routing, Middleware (authentication, logging, validation), Error Handling
Database Integration (SQL or NoSQL): PostgreSQL/MySQL with ORM (TypeORM/Prisma) OR MongoDB with ODM (Mongoose)
Database Schema Design, Advanced Queries, Migrations (for SQL)
Authentication & Authorization: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) implementation, OAuth 2.0 concepts, Role-Based Access Control
Server-Side Testing: Unit and Integration testing for API routes and database interactions

Week 4.topic: Cloud Deployment & DevOps Fundamentals: Frontend deployment (Vercel/Netlify), Backend deployment (AWS EC2/Lambda/ECS, Heroku, Render), Docker basics for containerization
Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Fundamentals with GitHub Actions or GitLab CI for automated workflows
Web Security Best Practices: OWASP Top 10, XSS, CSRF, SQL Injection prevention, Secure API design, Environmental Variables
Performance & Scalability: Caching strategies (Redis), Load Balancing concepts, Database Indexing, Monitoring Tools
Full-Stack Project Consolidation: Architect and build a complete end-to-end application applying all learned concepts, focusing on clean architecture, best practices, and production readiness
